casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joshua David SMITH. No. 234A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 23, 2008. Kirby H. Smith, New Bern, for Smith. Rick Shaffer, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of May 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of May 2008."
